item.title: Dorothea Salo on "The baroque artistic ideal can be characterized as?"
item.dc:creator: Dorothea Salo
item.description:
We:

a. are not here to do your homework.
b. suggest that you consult your class notes and textbook(s), or failing that
c. suggest that you consult a librarian at your school.
d. all of the above.

item.title: lnorton1 on "The baroque artistic ideal can be characterized as?"
item.dc:creator: lnorton1
item.description:
a. repose.
b. exuberance.
c. a single, static perspective.
d. a design complete in itself.
